param.name: series_id
param.sql: SELECT #__bsms_series.id AS sid, #__bsms_series.series_text, #__bsms_series.published AS srpub, #__bsms_studies.series_id, #__bsms_studies.published AS spub FROM #__bsms_series LEFT JOIN #__bsms_studies ON ( #__bsms_studies.id = #__bsms_series.id ) WHERE #__bsms_series.published = '1'
param.label: JBS_CMN_FILTERS_SERIES

param.name: booknumber
param.sql: SELECT DISTINCT #__bsms_studies.booknumber AS sbn, #__bsms_studies.published AS spub, #__bsms_books.booknumber AS bbn, #__bsms_books.bookname FROM #__bsms_books LEFT JOIN #__bsms_studies ON (#__bsms_studies.booknumber = #__bsms_books.booknumber) WHERE #__bsms_studies.published = '1' ORDER BY #__bsms_books.booknumber ASC
param.label: JBS_CMN_FILTERS_BOOKS

param.name: topic_id
param.sql: SELECT DISTINCT #__bsms_topics.id AS tid, #__bsms_topics.topic_text, #__bsms_studies.topics_id, #__bsms_studytopics.topic_id, #__bsms_studytopics.study_id FROM #__bsms_studies LEFT JOIN #__bsms_topics ON (#__bsms_topics.id = #__bsms_studies.topics_id) LEFT JOIN #__bsms_studytopics ON (#__bsms_studytopics.id = #__bsms_studies.topics_id)
param.label: JBS_CMN_FILTERS_TOPICS

param.name: embedshare
param.label: JBS_TPL_MEDIA_EMBEDSHARE
param.description: If set to Show a menu is presented in the internal media player that allows sharing and embedding options

param.name: templatecode
param.default:
{{teacher}} {{title}} {{date}}
{{studyintro}} {{scripture}}
param.label: JBS_TPL_TEMPLATECODE

param.name: teacher_templatecode
param.default:
{{teacher}} {{title}} {{teacher}}
{{short}} {{information}}
param.label: JBS_TPL_TEACHERLIST_TEMPLATECODE

param.name: teacher_detailtemplate
param.default:
{{teacher}} {{title}} {{teacher}}
{{short}} {{information}}
param.label: JBS_TPL_TEACHERDETAIL_TEMPLATECODE
